author: fh:ez.no
msg: - moved the character set conversion method into a private class so it can be removed later and does not pollute our public interface.

author: fh:ez.no
msg: ezcMailTools::parseMailAddresses. This allows you to parse not only
RFC822 complient address strings but also address strings in local
encoding. This is useful when ezcMailAddress items directly from
user inserted address string (e.g from a composer window).
